Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Child First Fidelity App

Multi-form clinical assessment application featuring:
- Foundational Phase Fidelity \(CPP/CF integrated\)
- Supervision Fidelity tracking
- Care Coordinator Interventions
- Vibrant glassmorphism UI with animated gradients
- PWA with offline support
- Local storage persistence
- PDF export capability

Built with React 18, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS v4.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
